briefTitle: Cardio Training of Older Adults With Central Obesity
officialTitle: Cardio Training of Older Adults With Central Obesity

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Participated in the Healthy Ageing Initiative (a population-based intervention study in Umeå, Sweden)
* Visceral adipose tissue mass \>1 kg (women) or \>2 kg (men)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Physical disability that affects ability to perform the exercises
* Heart failure or severe degenerative condition (e.g. malignant cancer or multiple sclerosis)
* Myocardial infarction or stroke in the past year
* Heart condition that can worsen with aerobic exercise (e.g. angina)

primary.measure: Change in visceral adipose tissue mass
primary.description: Mass (g) measured using Lunar iDXA with CoreScan application (GE Healthcare, Wauwatosa, WI, USA).

secondary.description: Mass (g) measured using Lunar iDXA with CoreScan application (GE Healthcare, Wauwatosa, WI, USA)
Veinous blood samples taken after \> 4 h of fasting
Measured in non-dominant hand with dynamometer (Jamar, Lafayette Instrument, USA). The better of two successive trials will be recorded.
Measured using Åstrands Submaximal Test, performed on an electrically braked ergometer bicycle

secondary.measure: Change in health-related quality of life

secondary.description: Fecal samples are taken and bacterial DNA is sequenced to determine bacterial composition

secondary.measure: Change in concentration of inflammatory markers
